title: How to Make Bacon, Cheese, and Avocado Omelet

steps.headline: Fry bacon crisp, but not over done.
Set aside in paper towel to absorb excess grease.
Slice the avocado half into long strips.
Scramble the eggs in a small bowl.
Distribute the butter over entire surface of the pan.
Pour the egg mixture into the pan and roll it until the eggs have covered the entire surface.
Lay four half slices of cheese down the middle of the egg surface from edge to edge.
Place the avocado slices onto the cheese.
Place the two bacon slices on top of the avocado slices.
Fold half the eggs over the middle ingredients.
Fold the other half over the first.
Place the omelet on the plate and enjoy.

text: Fry bacon crisp, but not over done.  Set aside in paper towel to absorb excess grease.  Break cheese slices in half.  Slice the avocado half into long strips.  Scramble the eggs in a small bowl.  Heat a 12" flat frying pan.  Distribute the butter over entire surface of the pan.  Pour the egg mixture into the pan and roll it until the eggs have covered the entire surface.  Lay four half slices of cheese down the middle of the egg surface from edge to edge.  Place the avocado slices onto the cheese.  Place the two bacon slices on top of the avocado slices.  Fold half the eggs over the middle ingredients.  Fold the other half over the first.  Place the omelet on the plate and enjoy.  Finished.
